DOC.brief_summary: The study is aimed to evaluate and describe the added value of inReach planning software on performance characteristics of standard bronchoscopy.
DOC.brief_title: Added Value of inReach Software on Performance Characteristics of Standard Bronchoscopy
DOC.criteria: Candidates for nonemergency bronchoscopy Must provide signed informed consent Male or female above 18 years old Lung lesions up to 3 cm in size (in largest diameter), nonvisible by standard bronchoscope CT done over a month before the bronchoscopy procedure
